replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
1249922508 发表于 2020-4-9 23:58
那具体应该怎么处理第一次遇到这样子的情况
国外社区的解决方法是（你机翻一下就知道意思了）

Maybe... 

What I would do is delete the configs for applied energistics and codechicken/microblocks and see if that works, if not then (temporarily) delete the mod and see if it works. If it does then it's an id conflict and you have to try to do the following

check if the block id's are below 4096ish but the item id's don't matter so they can be higher just make sure that NONE OF THE ID'S ARE TAKEN and that every id from every mod is not on another mod or else the game would crash or if you craft a quantum helmet (IC2) you might get a mudball(BoP).

If you change them make sure the id's aren't occupied, what I would do is get a item id from another mod and use those id's

for example if I need to change block.cement=6900 to a lower id then I would open a other config like gregtech and get the id from Electric.Axe=2169 so block.cement=2169 and Electric.Axe=9696 (A high number not in use)

Hope this helped/works.

还是建议让玩家少放点网格
乱码，尝试更换一下核心
